function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Pressure differentials between zones not maintained as per guidelines, leading to potential cross-contamination of air","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission of contagious diseases such as SARS-CoV-2","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring and adjustment of pressure differentials, proper maintenance of pressurized ventilator and exhaust systems","Technologies":"Pressure sensors, automated control systems for ventilation","People":"Occupants of the built environment, especially in shared spaces like dining and kitchen areas","Owner":"Building maintenance personnel or facilities management team"},{"Description":"Ineffective maintenance of HVAC systems leading to poor air quality and potential transmission of contagious diseases","Impact":"Risk of indoor transmission of SARS-CoV-2 and other airborne diseases","Mitigation":"Regular inspection, cleaning, and maintenance of HVAC systems, proper positioning of outdoor air vents","Technologies":"HVAC system monitoring sensors, air quality testing equipment","People":"Building maintenance personnel, HVAC technicians","Owner":"Facilities management team or building owner"},{"Description":"Ineffective water system maintenance leading to potential contamination and transmission of waterborne diseases","Impact":"Risk of waterborne disease transmission, including SARS-CoV-2 if present in water supply","Mitigation":"Regular inspection of drainage and water systems, unobstructed uplift ventilation pipe, use of sterilizers and equipment to ensure water safety","Technologies":"Water system monitoring sensors, sterilization equipment","People":"Building occupants utilizing water supply, maintenance personnel","Owner":"Facilities management team or building owner"}]}
